greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Second differences of sigma(n) that are positive.
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
maple: with (numtheory): f := [seq( sigma(i+2) - sigma(i+1) - (sigma(i+1) - sigma(i)), i=1..200)];
results.author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu), Jan 11 2000
